name: Rune of Invisibility
description: A powerful magical inscription that grants the wearer the ability to turn invisible. As an action, spend 3 energy to become invisible for up to 1 minute. The invisibility ends early if you attack or cast a spell. Once the invisibility ends (whether from duration or being broken), this ability cannot be used again for 1 hour. Can only be inscribed on accessories (amulet, ring, belt, bracer).
